title: Metal Music Collection
longDescription:
As Intersonic Sound, we wanted to bring together many colors of metal music and present it to you. The Metal Music Collection package consists of 22 different metal music pieces in total.


Please preview the package HERE.


We added 8 new metal music tracks to the collection, along with the 14 songs we previously released. You can find the list of new products below:


  1. Blight March_Full Version
  2. Blight March_Loop Version
  3. Darkened Day_Full Version
  4. Darkened Day_Loop Version
  5. Djent Song_Full Version
  6. Djent Song_Loop Version
  7. Djent Song 2_Full Version
  8. Djent Song 2_Loop Version
  9. Shaleborn_Full Version
  10. Melting Fires_Full Version
  11. Anger Management_Full Version
  12. Contaminated_Full Version


Some songs are also included in our different packages. We have collected these songs under the “Older Songs” folder. You can find the name of the products we mentioned and the name of the package they correspond to below:


Also included in Futuristic Music: Resonance package


  • Covert Ops
  • Flammable
  • Sanity's Edge
  • Search And Destroy
  • Thermite
  • Thermite Version 2


Also included in Mega Music Collection: 150 Unique Music package


  • Covert Ops
  • Flammable
  • Sanity's Edge
  • Search And Destroy
  • Thermite
  • Thermite Version 2
  • The Terminal
  • The Anvil
  • Wildfire
  • Wildfire 2
  • Denial
  • Drag
  • Insolation
  • Interceptor


NOTE: Some products are only loops, some are only full versions. Some have both versions. In programs such as Fmod Studio and Wwise, BPM information is written on the files so that they can be managed more easily.


ADVANTAGES


  • Commercial-level compositions.
  • Use songs on YouTube or any other platform, as well as games.
  • You will get separate download links for UE Engine versions 4.27, 5.0.3, and 5.1.0.
  • You can add extra dynamism to your songs with software such as Fmod Studio or Wwise.



Unique Audio Count: 22

Total Audio Count: 28

Total Audio Cues: 28

UE Versions: 4.27 - 5.0.3 - 5.1.0

Total Length: 1 hour

Total Size: 1.11 GB

Looping: Yes (for some tracks No)

File Type: 24-bit, WAV

Sample Rate: 44100

Mastered: Yes
technicalDetails:
You can email us with new ideas and opinions, technical questions, corrections or inquiries, or even just to chat. Your feedback enhances the value of every product you purchase, and we consider it important.


FAQ


Can I use your products in my commercial projects without any restrictions?

Yes, absolutely! You can use them in all kinds of content, including films, games, or YouTube videos, even for commercial purposes.


Will there be a problem if I upload a video to YouTube that contains music from Intersonic Sound?

No, it won't. The products are not registered with Content ID and are structured to not claim rights. You will not receive a copystrike warning for your channel.


Do you update your products?

There are products that we have updated and will continue to update. We may not update all of them, but the likelihood of us adding new content to your purchased product as a free update is very high.


What file format do you use?

We prefer 24-bit WAV files. If the package size becomes too large, we might consider 16-bit WAV, but we have not done this yet. For now, we have processed every product as a 24-bit WAV.
